decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-ST-AD-1000 LOCATION PLAN, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-ST-AD-1010 SITE PLAN - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-00-PL-AD-2000 GA PLAN - GROUND FLOOR - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-01-PL-AD 2002 GA PLAN - FIRST FLOOR- EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-02-PL-AD-2004 GA PLAN - SECOND FLOOR - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-03-PL-AD-2006 GA PLAN - ROOF - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-EL-AD-3000 GA ELEVATION - 01 - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-EL-AD-3002 GA ELEVATION-02-EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-SC-AD-4000 P2 GA SECTION - AA- EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-SC-AD-4002 REV P2 GA SECTION - BB - EXISTING, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-ST-AD-1011 SITE PLAN - PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-00-PL-AD-2001 REV P2 GA PLAN - GROUND FLOOR PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-01-PL-AD-2003 REV P2 GA PLAN - FIRST FLOOR - PROPOSED , 040-FKD-ZZ-02-PL-AD-2005 REV P2 GA PLAN - SECOND FLOOR - PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-03-PL-AD-2007 REV P2 GA PLAN - ROOF - PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-EL-AD-3001 GA ELEVATION - 01- PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-EL-AD-3003 GA ELEVATION - 02- PROPOSED, 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-SC-AD-4001 GA SECTION - AA-PROPOSED 040-FKD-ZZ-XX-SC-AD-4003 GA SECTION - BB-PROPOSED
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The proposed rooflight hereby approved shall be in accordance with the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2)

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).

| Notwithstanding any information submitted with this application, details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby approved is commenced. The details shall be fully implemented as approved.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h), 1.2 (g) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension, installation of three rooflights to front roof slope; alterations to rear fenestration; associated landscaping (Following demolition of existing single storey rear)
